schema:
  fields: 15
    - double: type=float64
        metadata: ["path": "double"]
    - float: type=float32
       metadata: ["path": "float"]
    - int32: type=int32
       metadata: ["path": "int32"]
    - int64: type=int64
       metadata: ["path": "int64"]
    - uint32: type=uint32
        metadata: ["path": "uint32"]
    - uint64: type=uint64
        metadata: ["path": "uint64"]
    - sint32: type=int32
        metadata: ["path": "sint32"]
    - sint64: type=int64
        metadata: ["path": "sint64"]
    - fixed32: type=uint32
         metadata: ["path": "fixed32"]
    - fixed64: type=uint64
         metadata: ["path": "fixed64"]
    - sfixed32: type=int32
          metadata: ["path": "sfixed32"]
    - sfixed64: type=int64
          metadata: ["path": "sfixed64"]
    - bool: type=bool
      metadata: ["path": "bool"]
    - string: type=utf8
        metadata: ["path": "string"]
    - bytes: type=binary, nullable
       metadata: ["path": "bytes"]
